categories: Category:Articles with elements from unlicensed sources

nodes.text: The Tyaonon system was a star system that was located within the galaxy's Wild Space region.
The system shared its name with the freighter Tyaonon Ranger.
The Tyaonon system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square R-18.
